headline: Garmin OnBoard System wins 2025 DAME Design Award
summary: Garmin (NYSE: GRMN), the world's largest1 and most innovative marine electronics manufacturer, today announced that Garmin OnBoard™, its wireless Man Overboard (MOB) and engine cutoff solution for boaters, was selected as the winner of the Safety & Security Aboard category in the 2025 DAME Design Awards. The winners of this prestigious program were announced at Metstrade, the world's largest exhibition of marine equipment, materials and systems, held Nov. 18-20 in Amsterdam.

The winners of this prestigious program were announced at Metstrade, the world's largest exhibition of marine equipment, materials and systems, held Nov. 18-20 in Amsterdam.
